txt.en: You have just been given your first opportunity to contribute to a Fellowship Skill! Fellowship Skills are Fellowship-based group attacks that can be very powerful if coordinated well. Different ordered contribution combinations will result in different Fellowship Skills. You can find more information about your available contribution skills and the Fellowship Skills you have been a part of in the Fellowship Skill Journal portion of the Character UI.

You have just been given your first opportunity to contribute to a Fellowship Skill! Fellowship Skills are Fellowship-based group attacks that can be very powerful if coordinated well. Different ordered contribution combinations will result in different Fellowship Skills.\n\nYou can find more information about your available contribution skills and the Fellowship Skills you have been a part of on the Fellowship tab of your Skills panel.
